description: This story humorously explains why snowmen avoid carrot cake.
title: The Carrot-Shape Dilemma
n_1: Sammy Snowman gazes at a carrot cake in the bakery window.
c2_1: Want to try some carrot cake, Sammy?
n_2: Carla Cake, the baker, offers a slice to Sammy.
c1_2: I'm not sure, Carla. I've heard rumors about carrot cake.
c2_2: Rumors? It's just a cake, Sammy!
n_3: Sammy imagines himself with a carrot-shaped belly.
c1_3: They say it can reshape a snowman's belly!
c2_3: That's just a silly myth, Sammy.
n_4: Sammy decides to try the cake, laughing off his worries.
c1_4: Well, I guess one slice won't hurt!
